abstract: Videotaped confession by Pedro Hernandez is shown to jury in trial for 1979 murder of six-year-old Etan Patz; defense argues that Hernandez cannot tell fantasy from reality and that many of his statements do not match evidence or witness testimony.
lead_paragraph: As the videotape of Pedro Hernandez’s confession played, some jurors scribbled notes and others leaned forward and stared at the television monitor, studying his face.

headline.main: Jury in Patz Murder Trial Views Taped Confession
headline.print_headline: Jury in Patz Murder Trial Views Taped Confession

snippet: As the videotape of Pedro Hernandez’s confession played, some jurors scribbled notes and others leaned forward and stared at the television monitor, studying his face.
